overview:
David Subar is the Chief Technology Officer for Break Media, and is responsible for product management and product development as well as managing the technical infrastructure. He leads an international team based in Los Angeles and Shanghai, and is responsible for the companyâ€™s multi-platform technology strategy across mobile and internet-connected CE devices, in addition to overseeing Breakâ€™s in-house advertising technology server, Apex.

Subar has over 18 years of experience and has held numerous technology leadership positions, most recently serving as CTO of Oversee.net where he ran a technology group responsible for over $200M in annual revenue. Previous posts include CTO of PeopleLink, an idealab! company, and CIO of Interthinx. Subar also spent five years serving as an interim CTO working with top venture capitalist firms to accelerate the growth of their portfolio companies. In 1994, Subar founded Interna Ltd., a game development company that created leading titles for game publishers Activision, Interplay and IBM, among others.
